    YahtzeeCategory - Enum Class in yahtzee
    This enum represents the different scoring categories in Yahtzee and provides methods to calculate the score for each category based on the dice rolled.
    YahtzeeCategory() - Constructor for enum class yahtzee.YahtzeeCategory
     
    YahtzeeController - Class in yahtzee
    This class defines methods to interact with the Yahtzee model, serving as the controller in the MVC design.
    YahtzeeController(YahtzeeModel) - Constructor for class yahtzee.YahtzeeController
    Constructs a YahtzeeController with the specified YahtzeeModel.
    YahtzeeDie - Class in yahtzee
    This class represents a single die in the Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeDie() - Constructor for class yahtzee.YahtzeeDie
    Constructs a YahtzeeDie and rolls it to initialize its value.
    YahtzeeInstance - Class in yahtzee
    This class represents a saved instance of a Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeInstance(YahtzeeModel) - Constructor for class yahtzee.YahtzeeInstance
    Constructs a YahtzeeInstance from the given YahtzeeModel.
    YahtzeeModel - Class in yahtzee
    This class manages the game state for the Yahtzee game, serving as the model in the MVC design.
    YahtzeeModel(String, String) - Constructor for class yahtzee.YahtzeeModel
    Starts a new Yahtzee game with the specified player names.
    YahtzeeModel(YahtzeeInstance) - Constructor for class yahtzee.YahtzeeModel
    Loads a saved Yahtzee game from the given YahtzeeInstance.
    YahtzeePlayer - Class in yahtzee
    This class represents a player in the Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeePlayer(String) - Constructor for class yahtzee.YahtzeePlayer
    Constructs a YahtzeePlayer with the specified name.
    YahtzeeScorecard - Class in yahtzee
    This class represents a player's scorecard in the Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeScorecard() - Constructor for class yahtzee.YahtzeeScorecard
     
    YahtzeeView - Class in yahtzee
    This class represents the view component of the Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeView(BoardGamesView) - Constructor for class yahtzee.YahtzeeView
    Constructor for loading a saved Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeView(BoardGamesView, String, String) - Constructor for class yahtzee.YahtzeeView
